description: Additional APIs for test support in GeckoView.

functions.name: setPrefs
functions.description: Set prefs and return a set of saved prefs

functions.name: restorePrefs
functions.description: Restore prefs to old value

functions.name: getPrefs
functions.description: Get pref values.

functions.name: getLinkColor
functions.description: Get resolved color for the link resolved by a given selector.

functions.name: getRequestedLocales
functions.description: Gets the requested locales.

functions.name: addHistogram
functions.description: Add a sample with the given value to the histogram with the given id.

functions.name: removeAllCertOverrides
functions.description: Revokes SSL certificate overrides.

functions.name: setScalar
functions.description: Set the given value to the scalar with the given id.

functions.name: setResolutionAndScaleTo
functions.description: Invokes nsIDOMWindowUtils.setResolutionAndScaleTo.

functions.name: getActive
functions.description: Returns true if the docShell is active for given tab.

functions.name: getPidForTab
functions.description: Gets the top-level pid belonging to tabId.

functions.name: getAllBrowserPids
functions.description: Gets the list of pids of the running browser processes

functions.name: getProfilePath
functions.description: Gets the path of the current profile

functions.name: killContentProcess
functions.description: Crash all content processes

functions.name: flushApzRepaints
functions.description: Invokes nsIDOMWindowUtils.flushApzRepaints for the document of the tabId.

functions.name: promiseAllPaintsDone
functions.description: A simplified version of promiseAllPaintsDone in paint_listeners.js.

functions.name: usingGpuProcess
functions.description: Returns true if Gecko is using a GPU process.

functions.name: killGpuProcess
functions.description: Kills the GPU process cleanly without generating a crash report.

functions.name: crashGpuProcess
functions.description: Causes the GPU process to crash.

functions.name: clearHSTSState
functions.description: Clears the sites on the HSTS list.

functions.name: triggerCookieBannerDetected
functions.description: Simulates a cookie banner detection

functions.name: triggerCookieBannerHandled
functions.description: Simulates a cookie banner handling

functions.name: triggerTranslationsOffer
functions.description: Simulates offering a translation.

functions.name: triggerLanguageStateChange
functions.description: Simulates expecting a translation.
